variable.name: active
variable.description: Denotes whether or not the component is active.

variable.name: state
variable.description: SDML description of the current state.

variable.name: no_paddocks
variable.description: Number of paddocks recognised by the component interface

variable.name: padd_names
variable.description: Name of each paddock recognised by the component interface

variable.name: padd_amounts
variable.description: Amount of supplement currently accessible to stock in each paddock recognised by the component instance

event.name: end_step
event.description: Computes amount of feed eaten and removes it from the paddock.

event.name: buy
event.description: Increases the amount of supplement in a store.

event.name: feed
event.description: Transfers an amount of supplement from store to one of the paddocks.

event.name: mix
event.description: Transfers an amount of supplement from one store into another.

event.name: on_conserve
event.description: Notifies the component that an amount of forage has been conserved.
